
Required TFLOPs/s by input shape (TTFT)
=======================================


This table summarizes, for each vision output token length and crop grid, the compute throughput (TFLOPs/s) required to satisfy the configured time-to-first-token (TTFT) requirement using the analytic flash-attention path.
